name: MDK 2
description: 3 Unlikely Heroes, 1 Ultimate Goal Kurt Hectic is back to save the universe. This time he is teamed with the genius Dr. Hawkins and the 6-legged gun-toting robotic dog, Max. Together they must out-sneak, out-blast and out-think their enemies as they attempt to reclaim earth from a vile alien menace.

MDK 2, a third person shooter, action-adventure, developed by Bioware, and the sequel to MDK developed by Shiny entertainment. The game follows the adventures of Kurt Hectic, a janitor who uses a chaingun with a limitless supply of bullets and a sniper rifle, Max, a six legged dog who smokes cigars and wields four guns, and Dr. Fluke Hawkins who utilises his intelligence to make materials to fix his problems. The game makes you go through 10 levels of killing aliens, giants aliens, and puzzle solving. Positive/s: The combat system is excellent Each of the three characters play differently, requiring different strategies to get through each level. Kickass music. Entertaining aliens and bosses A silly but entertaining story.  Overall a very fun and entertaining game.  9 out of 10
This game is as fun and funny as I remember it being. Can't wait to finish it again.
